/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, creating a corridor of urban architecture and greenery. Cars and pedestrians add movement and energy to the scene, painting a picture of a city in constant motion. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly, casting light on the scene and highlighting the colors of the cityscape.
